DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the relative bioavailability of Geneva and Basel (Anafranil) 25 mg Clomipramine Hydrochloride capsules under fasted conditions.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioavailability of Geneva and Basel (Anafranil) 25 mg Clomipramine Hydrochloride Capsules Under Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
